description: Fiery harissa and creamy tahini yoghurt spice up brussels sprouts in this simple middle eastern inspired dish.
name: Harissa Brussels Sprouts with Tahini Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cloves garlic, peeled and minced, divided
4 tbs olive oil, save 1 tsp for later

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Tip the brussels sprouts into a large bowl and add 2 tablespoons of harissa, 2 garlic cloves and 3 tablespoons of oil. Stir to coat well then tip the mix onto a baking tray. Roast for 20 minutes.
Whisk the yoghurt, lemon juice and zest, remaining garlic and tahini together in a bowl. Whisk the remaining harissa and oil together in a bowl.
Spread the tahini yogurt on plates, top with roasted sprouts, pistachios, a drizzle of harissa oil mix and fresh coriander and serve.
